dcterms:description: The CHiME-3 dataset was designed for speech enhancement and recognition tasks. It contains speech pronounced by a speaker positioned at different locations from a tablet device, mixed with outdoor noise recorded in various environments, including caf√©s, buses, pedestrian areas, and streets. The dataset includes 7,138 training, 1,640 development, and 1,320 test utterances, recorded using 6-channel microphones at a sampling rate of 16 kHz.
dcterms:title: CHiME-3 dataset
